doc.title: Choosing A Hierarchy Depth
doc.p: By default, only the bounding box of the cell selected is shown. This corresponds to zero hierarchy levels being shown.
To select more hierarchy levels, choose

ul.li: "Full Hierarchy" from the "Display" menu or press the "*" key to show all hierarchy levels
"Box Only" from the "Display" menu or press the "0" key to show only the bounding box (the default)
"Top Level Only" from the "Display" menu or press the "1" key to show the top level elements
"Increment Hierarchy" from the "Display" menu or press the "+" key to show one more hierarchy level
"Decrement Hierarchy" from the "Display" menu or press the "-" key to show one hierarchy level less
the hierarchy level entry fields below the cell list to change the current minimum or maximum level
